website_summaries.verdict: Great entry-level price point for an aboveground pool ladder with a generous weight limit and a gradated dual staircase design.
pros: Very easy to assemble with included video instructions
Dual set of stairs for exits and entrances
cons: Instability is a common concern among customers
Additional ballast or support may be necessary

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, shakes when climbing, platform is a trip hazard. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Considering it is a "tall" ladder, this isn't sturdy enough, and doesn't feel safe. The platform could be a trip hazard, whether stepping on it, or over it, to get in or out of the pool. Correctly assembled and tightened, the ladder still shakes and wobbles when climbing, as others have stated. The shorter Intex ladder that came with the pool, feels much safer, in my opinion. I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: racar45

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly. Not to the point that it bothers me, but it will my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Original Intex ladder split along the seam on the top radius after 4 years. Bought this to replace the original. This one has the platform at the top, so I thought my wife would handle this one better since she doesnt like ladders in the first place. Nope, shes going to hate it. It's more wobbly than the original. I'm sure it's just fine for a 70 pound child, but get my 220 pounds at the top and its wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Quit_Killing_Me

customer_reviews.title: Great, tall,sturdy, pool ladder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together.. higher than I expected, which was a pleasant surprise... legs easily straddle pool side, eliminating possible structural damage from entering/exiting pool without one. I bought the pool pad that sits at the bottom inside to prohibit rips and tears. The steps are spaced nicely, adding to the safety when in use. Mine feels very solid, no wobbling when you're on the top rung. The little platform at the top is nice just for sitting. I'm very pleased with this little ladder.. I'd happily recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne hurtig

customer_reviews.title: Not the ladder pictured. Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong ladder. I specifically ordered the one pictured for the platform at the top to make it easier for my 3 year old to get in and out of the pool. The one I received doesn’t have a platform. The box looked like it had been previously opened and taped back together, and there were missing pieces. The cross braces at the top were not in the box. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. We have some heavy weights in the family, and it’s in constant use here. I’d do it again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Platform is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW! JUST WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed w/this ladder. Not only did it come the very next day, it was so easy to assemble. It included regular instructions as well as a huge cardboard quick assembly guide with pictures. I'd been so frustrated with a previous, much more expensive ladder purchased @ a pool store that I went & ordered this one. SO NOT DISAPPOINTED! It took me about 20 mins to put together, was very sturdy & my sons were in the pool 10 mins later. That expensive ladder I'd referenced is going back to the store!!! Thanks Amazon for another great find!🤗🤗🙂
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette B.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service sucks, don’t expect a full return.
customer_reviews.text: The ladder was very simple to put together, only took me maybe 45 to do, once I got it up I quickly realized it wasn’t needed and was much too y’all for my purpose, so within 24 hours of assembling it I took it down...unused. Duct taped the box to ensure the return, and sent it back not only did it take 2 weeks for the return, I ONLY GOT HALF OF WHAT I PURCHASED IT ON HERE FOR! Customer service sucks with replies, and I can’t seem to accept I only got $40 back. They suck don’t expect your duck refund.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer c.wigz1892

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder, especially for us BIG guys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder to replace the ladder than came with our above ground pool. What sold me on it was the weight rating. After and pretty easy assembly, I tested it out. It was very sturdy. Sometimes it'd get put on some uneven grass, and would rock a little bit, but it kept sturdy, even after a 280 pound guy (me) used it. And my daughter loves the step platform on top that isn't included in many ladders. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a ladder, it does the job but I kind of wish I had spent the money for a better quality one. The white screw caps come off pretty easy, I had to glue them on so they’d stay.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K.

customer_reviews.title: Like OEM Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is as good or better than the ladder that came with our 48" above ground pool, looks like it would easily fit a 52" pool. Very easy assembly. Note for above ground pool owners, I have had this pool and also a smaller 42" Intex pool for the past 10 years and over that time have had to purchase 10 new intex pumps, impeller broken every time. I finally purchased a $200 - 1 1/2 hp REAL pump and have had a perfectly working and quiet pump for two full years!!!! Stop buying those $80 plastic Intex pumps.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: Great price, average quality.
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price of this ladder, and it was easy to assemble. The negative would be the quality of it. It's VERY wobbly getting n and out of the pool. It says it rated up to 300lbs however I'd be hesitant getting the lady if you or anyone else using it was over that weight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for intex pool height 52”
customer_reviews.text: Would give five stars if it wasn’t as wobbly. Was given 9’x18’x52” intex pool but no ladder. No where in town sells just the ladder so I had to make one out of pvc pipe which was very wobbly to say the least but lasted for the week I waited for this to come in. Got this ladder and had it put together in maybe 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worst ladder
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This is a terrible safety issue. The worst ladder ever used in my pools. It is very weak. The steps bent on a u shape when I stepped on each step. I was scared to attempt without my spouse holding it. We wasted money. We are shopping for a safe ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and when it arrived (earlier than expected) it was missing a part. I contacted VM Express and they responded quickly and tried to find the part I needed. When they couldn’t find the part, they quickly shipped me a whole new ladder without even requiring me to send back the initial item. The ladder is great, and the customer service from VM Express is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Petrinec

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is not very sturdy, needs to be anchored to ground. I weigh 115 lbs and it shakes and feels like I am going to fall off. Do not feel it is very safe, especially for children.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good ladder for the money. I am heavy, it says it will hold my weight, but it’s shaky when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: it works, but it is noticeably wobblier then the older model one that came with our pool. will likely rust out after a year or so as its been in our pool for 3 months and is already showing signs of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P

customer_reviews.title: Way too high for the sturdiness of the ladder
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this ladder. Hard to put together, the steps don’t stay in place. Does not feel sturdy to step on, we keep the ladder on the outside of the pool, SERP up on the first couple steps and step over into the pool. Way too high for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Dale

customer_reviews.title: Unstable ladder.
customer_reviews.text: I hope I can add a picture. My husband put it together a few days after it arrives. Box was pretty banged up. We stepped in to the pool all is fine for a few days . A few days later as we are getting out, we noticed that the ladder seemed lopsided and extremely unstable. When we took it out it was bent! Bar had a slash in the joint. I will take a picture. I’ve written to manufacturer but no response.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest one for 52" pool.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest option out there but it does what it supposed to do. Last one lasted 3 years before rusting out( always pulled it out of the pool after done swimming) which is the case for any Intex product I've ever bought. Don't expect it to last for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, a little bit of bowing
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, but I wish there was a metal brace under the platform to help stop the legs from bowing inward. Also, would have been nice if it were a little wider at the top.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jade Young

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this ladder in about 10 minutes. Easy to assemble with easy to follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Don1

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but a little shaky. Not so much that we can't use it. Platform is nice to be able to turn around on, but it's small. For a cheaper pool ladder, it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. I was looking for a ladder that would be easy to take out of the pool due to my back issues. This ladder is light & easy to manage
customer_reviews.author: pullman

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Taller than our original ladder, but the kids love it. They can jump off the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a bit confusing, but my teen daughter and I were able get it out together. It seems fairly sturdy for us and glad to have found one at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer mommie

customer_reviews.title: A decent latter for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is decently sturdy and easy to assemble, worth it for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted the seat/ bench at the top. It is safer getting in and out than the previous ladder we had lacking the top bench. It is a little shaky, but sturdier than our previous intex ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very unstable. I'm only 185# and it wobbles. it moves around, when in the pool, just from the water coming back trough the return. it is not wide enough. I have to turn sideways, to get through the railings, at the top!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Also the fine print that is on the ladder steps hurts your feet when you climb up them. I would NOT order this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable will need weights or heavy people to use it
customer_reviews.text: We had this same type of pool ladder for 20 years. I got rusty and we tossed it. Replaced with this. Not as sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: We love our pool!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has gotten so much pleasure out of our Intex 22’ x 52” ultra frame pool. Makes this Texas heat so much more manageable! We did however have to upgrade our pump / filter. The one that came with it is entirely too small for a pool this size.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: great quality ladder, but it could be just a tad bit wider. other than that? wonderful all around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Pro Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has worked great for getting in and out of my pool
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the one that came with the pool. Would be better if it was a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Brown

customer_reviews.title: Old lady Didi it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 72 year old grandma and it was easy to assemble, is very sturdy, and a good price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Valentino

customer_reviews.title: ... was opened when it was delivered but it looked like all the part were there
customer_reviews.text: Box was opened when it was delivered but it looked like all the part were there.
customer_reviews.author: mare

customer_reviews.title: Broke with in a month of using it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in April to have it ready for the summer. We started using the latter at the End of May and it is now June. The bolts holding the top plastic piece broke. Yes I can go buy new bolts< its just very disappointing that if broke so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bean

customer_reviews.title: It is not sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is not stable. Very wabbly. It tips when adults climb on it to enter the pool. Little kids it wiggles around when climbing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Joy Kroschel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together. Could be a bit wider and a little sturdier but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: Already has a hole in it. Don’t waste your money. Stored it for the winter. Garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my pool
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are very clear. This is perfect for my pool. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sullymay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Feels stronger than another kind we had, the steeps are a little narrower.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Best value for Intex pool. Warning - if you have a salt water filter it will corrode the metal on the ladder over time.
customer_reviews.author: David Klander

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the ladder that came with our Intex above ground pool. This ladder is simple to put together and way more sturdy than the one we had before. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's a little wobbly but for the cheapest 54" ladder available it's a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: pstreck1

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Half the parts were bent when I got it, 2 steps broken. I just want a refund I don’t want to have to go through the process of returning this garbage, because that’s where I PUT IT WHERE IT BELONGS IN THE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous ladder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very clear instructions. Sturdy. We've had others in the past from other companies. 30 minutes start to finish. Super impressed. Everything was labeled very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Godsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good for getting in and out of pool. Easy to remove for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what we were looking for and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladder so far. Wish I had bought one sooner. Nice up grade from standard one.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Put the ladder together did all the things it said to do and it wobbles very badly.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a week before we thought! Great ladder for our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Extremely wobbly and not sturdy. Absolutely do not reccomend or plan on relying on this product to help my children exit and enter the pool safely
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Merendino

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: Works for a 48” y’all pool too and love the platform too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Wobbly as all hell.. was easy to assemble but it's not at all safe my 6'0 140 pound special needs nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford G.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we need. I gave it 4 stars because its not as sturdy as i was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Replaced missing part quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a part, contacted the seller and a replacement was sent to me very fast. Really nice pool ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non
customer_reviews.text: It took about one hour to set up but it works good
customer_reviews.author: Ruba

customer_reviews.title: disgusted
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it was open and tape closed again an parts were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Purchased to replace our broken pool ladder and this one fits the budget
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller and product were GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I used it for our new 20 x 52 pool
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeCinti

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and strong
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product is very easy to assemble and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need it temporarily until our deck is built around our pool. It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd’s

customer_reviews.title: l But they have been really nice in trying to replace my ladder
customer_reviews.text: I'm waiting for a replacement ,l But they have been really nice in trying to replace my ladder,it's on back order.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. Delivered timely and using at this ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Delivered timely and using at this time. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: So this pool stand is overall decently made. So far it has not rusted, or had any pieces broken. The only downfall is that it is a bit wobbly, not so much as a delicate shake, just an uneasy one
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and instructions were easy to understand. Ladder is pretty sturdy even for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder another Intex winner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, deck top very nice touch, makes place to sit for view pool activity and take great photos.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lyerly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that you can sit on the top of the ladder. My dog loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement ladder
customer_reviews.text: Im using it for a backup. Assembly should b just as easy as the original.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

product_meta.title: Intex 28067E Steel Frame Above Ground Swimming Pool 52" Pool Entry Step Ladder
product_meta.description: Size:52 inchWhen it comes to getting in and out of your above ground swimming pool, safety and convenience are your number one priorities, which is why Intex created the Above Ground Pool Ladder for 52-Inch Wall Height Pools. Don't risk injury jumping in and out of your pool when this ladder makes using your pool easier and safer. This double-sided Intex pool ladder features high-impact, slip resistant plastic steps for a safe platform, as well as a coated steel frame to help prevent corrosion and to allow your ladder to stand up to all kinds of weather. Make your pool time fun as safe and easy as possible with the Intex Above Ground Pool Ladder for 52-Inch Pools.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Swimming pool ladder designed to make it easy to climb in and out of a deeper pool
STEPS: High-impact, slip-resistant steps provide durability and a solid platform
DURABLE: Sturdy pool ladder that will make climbing safe and made of steel and only weighs 26 pounds
BUILT TO LAST: Crafted to work well with above-ground pools and coated corrosion-resistant steel frame ensures longevity
SIZE: Designed to work with 52-inch wall heights with a weight capacity of 300 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars380 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
